COMMENT_TX: Snow fell before and throughout the game; flurries were most intense in the first inning when time was called for six minutes.
$Rice stopped midway to 2B and was tagged after run scored
$Rice stopped midway to 2B; Dittmer ran him back toward 1B before flipping to Adcock to get Staley; the run scored before Adcock could tag Rice.

ej,stane101,M,dascf901,Intentionally dropped ball $Bobby Hofman intentionally dropped the popup but Dick Sisler declared out; Vern Benson thought he had to run; Cardinals Manager Eddie Stanky ejected by HP umpire Frank Dascoli
$out on infield fly rule as ball fell safely
ej,stane101,M,secof101,Call at 2B $Cardinal manager Stanky ejected by 2B umpire Secory for force out call at 2nd base
ej,walkd101,C,stewb901,Call at 1B Cardinals Coach Dixie Walker ejected by 1B umpire Bill Stewart
$bunt off Joe Adcock's glove to Del Crandall who threw into RF
$Carl Furillo bruised his hip on Ray Jablonski hit in 1st

ej,schod101,P,donaa901,Bench jockeying (Threw towel) ej,stane101,M,donaa901,Bench jockeying Dick Schofield and Cardinals Manager Eddie Stanky ejected by HP umpire Augie Donatelli; Schofield had not yet played his first game
the rest of the game is conjecture
ej,repur101,P,warnl101,Called third strike Rip Repulski ejected by HP umpire Lon Warneke
$Stan Musial was trapped off 2B before Enos Slaughter was run down
ej,yvars101,P,jackb901,Call at HP Sal Yvars ejected by HP umpire Bill Jackowski
$Del Rice thought Richie Ashburn was stealing 2B so he threw to no one at 2B
$Del Rice and Monte Irvin injured in collision at HP
$Joe Garagiola overthrew 1B on the pickoff attempt
ej,sereb101,P,robel901,Bench jockeying Bill Serena ejected by HP umpire Lenny Roberts
ej,jeffh101,P,robel901,Bench jockeying Hal Jeffcoat ejected by HP umpire Lenny Roberts
